Key Match Events: Jos Buttler and Alex Hales shared an unbeaten opening stand of 170 runs.
Chris Jordan took 3 wickets on his return to the side.
Hardik Pandya scored 63 off 33 balls and Virat Kohli made a half-century.
Pre-Game Insights: England made two changes to their side: Mark Wood was out due to injury and Dawid Malan was replaced by Phil Salt.
India stuck with the same team that played Zimbabwe.
Post-Match Reflections: Jos Buttler praised the team's character and performance.
Rohit Sharma expressed disappointment and criticized the bowling performance.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was held at Adelaide Oval.
The game was live on Sky Sports Cricket.
Others: England will play Pakistan in the final on Sunday.
The final will be held at the Melbourne Cricket Ground.
